dcterms:creator: Alexandre Robicquet
Amir Sadeghian
Alexandre Alahi
Silvio Savarese
dcterms:description: Stanford Drone Dataset is a well established benchmark for human trajectory prediction in bird’s eye view. The dataset consists of 20 scenes captured using a drone in top down view around the university campus containing several moving agents like humans and vehicles.
dcterms:title: Stanford Drone Dataset

dcterms:creator: Alon Lerner
Yiorgos Chrysanthou
Dani Lischinski
dcterms:description: The ETH/UCY dataset group consists of five different scenes – ETH & HOTEL (from ETH) and UNIV, ZARA1, & ZARA2 (from UCY). All the scenes report the position of pedestrians in world-coordinates and hence the results are reported in meters. The scenes are captured in unconstrained environments with few objects blocking pedestrian paths.
dcterms:title: ETH/UCY Dataset
